H0.text: Sunlight is the source of energy produced by plants.

H1.text: Groundwater is the source of the energy produced by plants.

H2.text: Animals are the source of the energy produced by plants.

H3.text: Evaporation is the source of the energy produced by plants.

A4.text: Photosynthesis converts light energy from sunlight into chemical energy stored in carbohydrates.

A5.text: The process of photosynthesis begins when light energy is absorbed by reaction centers containing photosynthetic pigments.
